title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2016 Physibit 8-chip set #14LOT 2: 2016 Physibit 8-chip set #20**Each set comes with 8 Physibit holograms**LOT 3: 2019 Magical Crypto Friends 4-coin set #27 & 4-chip setSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0027BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: NOVEMBER 29th, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: BTC: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qtsLN, ETH, LTC, DOGE also accepted due to BTC network congestion/fees being ridiculous!!SHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
